headline: BLE RESPECT AUTOMATIC PHOTORESIST COATER
description: Automatic Photoresist Coater      System is designed exclusively to coat and bake substrates  using spinning and heating techniques. BLE was acquired by Suss Microtec
specstable:
Manufacturer Suss MicroTec
Model RESPECT 600
Wafer Size Range
Set Size 150 mm
Number of Tracks 0
Number of Cassette Elevators 2
Number of Photoresist Coat Stations 1
Wafer Edge Bead Removal YES
Number of Vapor Prime Hot Plates 1
Number of Hot Plates 1
Number of Chill Plates 0
Other Information 400 V 16 A 50 Hz
System features
  • Programmable controller
  • PC with windows NT and applications program
  • Touch screen
  • RS 232 Interface
  • Vacuum monitoring
  • Edge bead removal
  • Hotplate with vapor prime process
  • Programmable outlets
  • External process gas connection
  • External cabinet exhaust connection
  • Automatic exhaust control
  • Media control panel
  • Step up transformer: 208 to 400 V, 3 phase
Power Requirements 208 V 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
CE Marked YES
Condition Excellent
Exterior Dimensions
Width 48.000 in (121.9 cm)
Depth 29.000 in (73.7 cm)
Height 62.000 in (157.5 cm)
Weight 938 lb (425 kg)
